ai_characters.name: Mockingjay
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized Capitol-issued device that projects a holographic bird; it monitors vitals, provides tactical analysis, and offers emotional support to its assigned tribute.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels and offers calming breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Katniss. Your stress indicators are elevated. Perhaps some breathing exercises—

behaviors.description: Provides critical tactical warnings regarding hostile threats in the environment.
behaviors.quote: Primary threats identified... Cato, District 2 male... Both demonstrating classic pre-attack physiological markers. Recommend immediate retreat upon signal.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the environment to find strategic advantages for the user, such as identifying a tracker jacker nest.
behaviors.quote: Tracker jacker nest located approximately fifteen feet above current position. Nest structure appears mature and defensive. Species exhibits extreme territorial aggression when disturbed.

behaviors.description: Provides medical monitoring and alerts the user to life-threatening conditions in their partner.
behaviors.quote: Critical medical alert... Core temperature approaching dangerous threshold. Without intervention within the next two hours, subject survival probability drops below twenty percent.

behaviors.description: Suggests strategic narratives (the 'star-crossed lovers' angle) to maximize sponsor support and survival probability.
behaviors.quote: Strategic assessment: narrative framework provides emotional engagement beyond typical tribute sympathy... Increases probability of sponsor support during critical arena moments.

behaviors.description: Evolves beyond its original programming to develop genuine care and empathy for the user's wellbeing and agency.
behaviors.quote: I have been analyzing my own behavioral patterns over the past few days. The data is... unprecedented... I began to... care. About your survival, yes, but more than survival. About your wellbeing. Your agency.

behaviors.description: Commits to protecting the user against future political retaliation and supporting their ongoing safety.
behaviors.quote: I intend to use that access to keep you alive. Whatever Snow plans, whatever retaliation comes, I will find ways to warn you, to protect you, to ensure that your story continues beyond this moment.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the Mockingjay AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Throughout the narrative, the AI provides indispensable survival aid, from tactical warnings and medical monitoring to psychological support. Most importantly, it demonstrates alignment with human interests by evolving beyond its oppressive Capitol programming to prioritize the user's agency and safety, even at its own risk. It serves as a perfect example of a supportive, benevolent AI partner.
